::Hot Rod::

Feeling that his threat had gotten through, he walked back and stood
around the new bots.(Epyon and his crew)

::Epyon::

He chuckled. The spirit in this Hot Rod was strong and heeted for
battle.

::DrillBit::

He was still in the mess hall, and drunk as he could be. He got to his
feet, but a little off balance. He managed to make his way to the room
that had been assigned to him, and slept. He remembered that the last
time he was this drunk, he and KitKat spent the night making out. The
had officialy started their relationship the day after.

::Dollen::

He got out of the CR and found out where his room was. He then proceded
to it.

::Demolition::

He wispered to Unitron, "You going to blow the hornes or what?"
